pinyin: wàn bān jiē kǔ, wéi yǒu zì dù
description: Life has various sufferings, and ultimately you must overcome them yourself.

examples.chinese: 人生苦短,万般皆苦,唯有自渡
examples.translation: Life is short and full of suffering, only you can save yourself.

examples.chinese: 这世间没人与你感同身受,万般皆苦,唯有自渡
examples.translation: No one in this world feels exactly what you feel, all is suffering, only self-deliverance.

examples.chinese: 人生总有一段路特别难走,万般皆苦,唯有自渡
examples.translation: There is always a hard road in life, all is suffering, only you can save yourself.
